SEARCH
Package entity.domain

Class Student

java.lang.Object
entity.domain.User
entity.domain.Student
public class Student extends User
Represents a student in the Internship Placement Management System. Extends the abstract User class.

      public Student(String userId, String userName, int year, String major)
      Constructs a new Student object with inputs
      Parameters:
      userId - Matriculation number: Begins with U, 7 digits and ends with a letter
      userName - Student name
      year - Student year of study (1-4)
      major - Student major (Computer Science)

    • apply

      public void apply(InternshipOpportunity opp, ApplicationRepository appRepo)
      Allows a student to apply for an opportunity. Uses the ApplicationRepository to store the application.
      Parameters:
      opp - opportunity to apply for
      appRepo - repository used to persist the new application
